sentences.sentence: Let's sit quiet a bit, Toady!
sentences.translation: 我们安静地坐一会儿吧，蛤蟆仔！

sentences.sentence: It will be your head next time, Toady!
sentences.translation: 下次就是你的脑袋，蛤蟆仔！

sentences.sentence: "It's for your own good, Toady," went on the Rat.
sentences.translation: “这是为了你自己好，蛤蟆仔。”水鼠兰特接着说。
